When checked, this causes every selected scenario to begin when the endgame triggers. This may have unexpected results if modded scenarios using the same factions and/or regions are enabled.
Increase or decrease the difficulty of endgame scenarios.
When checked, factions involved in endgame scenarios can make peace deals and confederations with other factions. Enabling this will reduce the difficulty of the official scenarios.
How many turns you have to prepare for the endgame once the warning event is triggered.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Dwarfs as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Undead of the Black Pyramid as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.

When checked, one of the selected endgame scenarios will begin within the turn timer range. If both the Long Victory and turn timer options are unchecked, scenarios will [[col:red]]not[[/col]] trigger.
The minimum and maximum turns the endgame scenario will begin between.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Vampire Counts as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.
When checked, an endgame scenario where absolutely nothing happens will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign. There's no such thing as man-sized rats.

When checked, one of the selected endgame scenarios will begin after completion of the Long Victory conditions. If both the Long Victory and turn timer options are unchecked, scenarios will [[col:red]]not[[/col]] trigger.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Greenskins as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Wood Elves as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.
When checked, an endgame scenario involving the Chaos Dwarfs as antagonists will be added to the potential threats that can trigger during the campaign.
